column4: can anyone help me configure built in wireless on a Presario v4000? I have just installed Ubuntu 6.10
possibly. is it recognized by ubuntu out of the box?
your chipset is ipw2200
it should already work
so it works, just no light?
yes
not sure about that :/ let me check google
thanks for any input you might have.
your other LEDs work right?
yes, all other led's work just fine out of the box
i ran that command in a terminal, got a "permission denied". so i logged in as root and then ran command.  nothing seemed to happen.  Is that to be expected?
yes
now restart networking
is there a command that'll allow me to restart without having to lost this connection?
yes
try this: rmmod ipw2200 then when it's done with that do modprobe ipw2200 all as root. you will lose your connection too
no. that's why dont use ubuntu ;)
i have just remembered another issue this laptop seems to have.
check that under Preferences > Power Management in gnome, i think
&Ashton_nK, thanks for your knowledge!  I'm gonna play on the internet now *hug*
